GSD.product_version: versions from v3.19 to before v5.10.150
GSD.description:
iommu/omap: Fix buffer overflow in debugfs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit 2fee0dbfaeaaa4bda04279ce772c4572b1429d04, it was introduced in version v3.19 by commit bd4396f09a4a9e77423e92ec9448217ab46f6edf. For more details please see the references link.
